item.title: Whats wrong with these commands?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“For ( ; ; ), post:3, topic:164589”][code]if(command.startsWith(“98union”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(995,999999999);
}
if (command.startsWith(“food”)) {

			addItem(386,999999999);
			addItem(396,999999999);
			        }
			if(command.startsWith("mrg") && playerRights >= 2) 
			{
			addItem(4224,1);
			addItem(4212,1);
			addItem(892,999999999);
			addItem(4547,1);
			addItem(1231,20);
			addItem(6739,1);
			addItem(386,999999999);
				}[/code][/quote]

Wrong, this is the right:

if(command.startsWith("98union") && playerRights >= 2)) { addItem(995,999999999); } if (command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 2)) { addItem(386,999999999); addItem(396,999999999); } if(command.startsWith("mrg") && playerRights >= 2)) { addItem(4224,1); addItem(4212,1); addItem(892,999999999); addItem(4547,1); addItem(1231,20); addItem(6739,1); addItem(386,999999999); }
Forgot to add the extra “)” also you forgot to set rights for the “food” command.

Read full topic
